Akwa bu ihe akwarakwa eji eno na ulo,
Akwa bu otu n'ime  Ngwa ulo aba edose ebe ana ehi ura,izu ike ma obu izu ike.o
Ufodu akwa nke ugbua nwere ihe di rufu rufu na elu ihe akwa
Akwa ndia na ano na elu ihe shiri ike, maobukwanu osisi di mbara
Ufodu akwa gunyere ndia; igbe udummiri nke akwa buru ibu na aba, ejiri osisi na udummiri mee nke na enye aka na akwa
Akwa di na nha di iche iche, site na nha nke umu ntakiri,nha obere maka nke otu onye ga edina ruo na nha nke kacha ha nile nke emere maka mmadu abuo
Ebe Ufodu akwa ndina bu maka otu onye nke no na elu osisi,, enwekwara ufodu ozo dika akwa ndina mofi nke akwakoro na ahu ulo na ndi ozo di iche iche
Temporary beds include the inflatable air mattress and the folding camp cot
Some beds contain neither a padded mattress nor a bed frame, such as the hammock
Other beds are made specifically for animals.
Àkwà nwere ike ịnwe okpu isi maka izu ike, ma nwee ike ịnwe okporo ụzọ n'akụkụ na okpu ụkwụ
Àkwà "naanị Headboard" nwere ike itinye "mkpịsị ájá", "ikpu àkwà", ma ọ bụ "akpụkpọ ụkwụ" iji zoo akwa akwa
Iji kwado isi, a na-etinyekarị ohiri isi nke e ji ihe dị nro, nke a na-etinye n'elu matarasị
A na-ejikarị ụdị blanket ụfọdụ eme ihe iji kpuchie onye na-ehi ụra, mgbe mgbe, akwa akwa, ma ọ bụ duvet, nke a na-akpọkarị akwa
Àkwà bụ akụkụ a na-ewepụghị nke a na-etinye n'àkwà, nke na-eme ka a sachaa ma ọ bụ wepụ ihe ndị a.
Na Europe, a na-etinye matarasị na ahịhịa, ahịhịhịa ahịhịrị, ntutu anụmanụ (dịka ntutu ịnyịnya, nke a na-eji eme ihe maka ike ya), ajị anụ siri ike, ma ọ bụ ábụ́bà ala, ma na-etinye ya n'elu
Ogwe matarasị a, na ákwà, blanket, na ohiri isi, bụ ihe ndị Europe oge ochie kpọrọ "àkwà"; enwere ike ịkwanye ya n'ehihie (iji ya eme ihe nke na-adịgide na okwu dị ka featherbed)

Ihe ndina ahụ, ọbụlagodi mgbe ọ dị, kwadoro ihe ndina ahụ, mana a naghị ele ya anya dị ka akụkụ ya.: 674-5 vol1 Ihe ọhụrụ ndị e mere mgbe e mesịrị mere ka ihe ndina ahụ dịkwuo mfe, ma mee ka ọ dịkwuo mkpa.: 481vol3: 674vol1: 675-6 vol1
